sentences.en: Add a teaspoon of vanilla extract to the juice.
sentences.cn: 在果汁中加一茶匙香草香精.

sentences.en: And give her a teaspoon of the medicine after every meal.
sentences.cn: 每餐之后给她吃一茶匙的药.

sentences.en: Drop the dough onto a baking sheet with a teaspoon.
sentences.cn: 用茶匙把生面团舀到烤盘上。

sentences.en: Finely grate about a teaspoon of orange zest and put aside.
sentences.cn: 将橙皮擦出大约一茶匙的细末待用。

sentences.en: He scraped out the bowl ( = removed everything from it ) with a teaspoon.
sentences.cn: 他用茶匙把碗刮干净了.

sentences.en: I need a teaspoon to stir my tea.
sentences.cn: 我需要一把茶匙搅一搅茶.

sentences.en: It would be preposterous to shovel coal with a teaspoon.
Kiwi fruit can be eaten by cutting off the tops and scooping out the insides with a teaspoon.
sentences.cn: 可以把猕猴桃的顶部切掉，用茶匙把里面的果肉挖出来吃。

sentences.en: Stir in 1 level teaspoon of yeast.
sentences.cn: 加入一平茶匙的酵母后搅拌。

sentences.en: Tap the eggs gently with a teaspoon to crack the shells.
sentences.cn: 用茶匙轻敲鸡蛋，让蛋壳开裂。

sentences.en: The handle of the telltale teaspoon was visible under the bed - valance.
sentences.cn: 因为说明问题的那把汤匙已暴露在床帷下.

sentences.en: Tomorrow, if you work well, you may have a teaspoon full of honey in your rice.
sentences.cn: 明天, 如果你锻炼得好, 我会放一茶匙蜂蜜在你的米饭里.

trans.tran_en: a small spoon that you use for mixing sugar into tea and coffee
